data.title: Celebrities Who Live in Los Feliz
data.meta_description: This is a list of celebrities who live in Los Feliz, loosely ranked by fame and popularity. Los Feliz is a popular hillside neighborhood located between ...
data.text:
This is a list of celebrities who live in Los Feliz, loosely ranked by fame and popularity. Los Feliz is a popular hillside neighborhood located between Hollywood and Silver Lake in Los Angeles, CA. Many of the homes in the area are Spanish colonial, and many were built around the 1920s. Several famous actors, actresses, musicians, and comedians live in Los Feliz. At least one famous television star even purchased his home from a popular film actor.

Who is the most famous person who lives in Los Feliz, or has lived in Los Feliz? Katy Perry tops our list. She owned a home there with former husband Russell Brand, and has also been infamously involved in a legal squirmish over an area convent as well. Angelina Jolie joined the ranks of Hollywood royalty when she plopped down a record $24.5 million for Cecil B. DeMille's former estate in the gated community of Los Feliz's Laughlin Park.

Megan Fox is also on the list of famous people who live in Los Angeles. In 2010, the Transformers actress bought a $2.94 million dollar mansion in the Los Feliz district of Los Angeles (she later sold it in 2014). The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo actress Rooney Mara lived with her boyfriend Charlie McDowell and their two dogs in Los Feliz, but put the house up for sale in 2018, after moving in with Joaquin Phoenix. Other actors and actresses who have lived in the L.A. neighborhood Kristen Bell, Dax Shepherd, and Liv Tyler.

Twilight actor Robert Pattinson sold his Los Feliz home in 2014 to The Big Bang Theory star Jim Parsons. Kristen Stewart previously lived in the home with Pattinson. Colin Farrell purchased a four bedroom home in Los Feliz in 2006. He paid $4.3 million for the property. Walt Disney lived in Los Feliz when he developed the iconic character Mickey Mouse.

If you're looking for celebrity houses in Los Feliz, you might spot Jon Hamm, Eva Mendes, or Colin Farrell living it up in what some locals refer to as the "Eastside."
